channel.title: vSphere with Tanzu 101 – Closing Summary
channel.description: Recent content in Closing Summary on vSphere with Tanzu 101

item.title: Docs: Resources and References
item.description:
Links to additional materials:

  • For more information on vSphere with Tanzu check out the vSphere product page.
  • vSphere with Tanzu by Kit Colbert
  • vSphere with Tanzu - YouTube by Sheldon D'Paiva 
  • ebook: Deliver Developer-Ready Infrastructure Using vSphere with Tanzu
  • KubeAcademy courses are composed of a series of bite-size video lessons - terrific resource for learning about containers, Kubernetes, and Cloud Native Concepts.
  • Scaling a Tanzu Kubernetes Cluster by Kenny Coleman
  • An Elevated View of the Tanzu Kubernetes Kubernetes Grid Service Architecture by Kenny Coleman
  • Dissecting a Tanzu Kubernetes Cluster Spec with the TKG Service for vSphere by Kenny Coleman

Web: https://tanzu.vmware.com

Blog: https://tanzu.vmware.com/blog

Twitter: @vmwaretanzu

Email: asktanzu@vmware.com
